item.title: AI for chemistry startup CuspAI raises $100 million in new venture capital funding
item.description: The round, which values CuspAI at a reported $520 million, is being led by NEA and Temasek, with Nvidia's NVentures, Samsung, and Hyundai Motor Group ...

item.title: Twilio CEO interviews candidates for 45 minutes over dinner—he’s listening for one word in particular, and you’re not hired if you say it too much
item.description: If you say “I” too much in the interview you don’t get the job, the CEO of the $16 billion tech company Twilio tells Fortune.

item.title: I went from side-hustling to running a $27 million-a-year marketing agency that works with MrBeast: Here’s my most important investment
item.description: The millennial CEO's best advice for his 20-year-old self? “Don’t try to start a business with just interns.”

item.title: Millions of Gen Z are jobless yet they’re ghosting employers—experts say voice notes are the cure to their phone anxiety
